work.title: I work as a technology consultant, helping ambitious startups with early product development. This can look like validating the technical strategy for a platform or building an app from scratch. I got here after cutting my teeth as a developer, and spending a good few years specialising in front end architecture, scalability, and Vue.js.

items.title: Technology consultant
list: Product thinking across phasesâ€”from concept to ship to 2.0s
Digital solutions to help businesses streamline their workflows
Thoughtful collaborator with in-house teams and wearer of many hats across engineering, product, and design
Eye on design and UX; this includes user persona research and information architecture framework
Web3 trends, terminology, and Web3.js and Ether.js libraries

items.title: Frontend Engineer
list: Former Lead Frontend Engineer at a top UK Fintech; in charge of building the dashboard for investor portfolio management. During a significant period of company growth, I led the development of new frameworks, improved UI/UX, and built scalable applications
6y+ of experience in Javascript and front end tools (Cypress, Vue.js, Electron...)
Doing my bit to contribute to the open source community
